hypothesis_content.title: Stress-to-Neutral Transition via VIX-Crypto Correlation Break
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes, when 5-day correlation between BTC and VIX drops from >0.7 to <0.2 while BTC establishes higher low pattern over 3 days, the regime will transition to NEUTRAL within 3 trading days with 68% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Decoupling from traditional risk indicators (VIX) shows crypto-specific stress is abating. Higher lows indicate buying at elevated levels. Stablecoin inflow shows dry powder accumulation. Reduced leverage lowers systemic risk.
entry_conditions: BTC-VIX 5-day rolling correlation drops from >0.7 to <0.2
BTC forms consecutive higher lows over 3 days
Aggregated exchange stablecoin reserves increase >2% over 3 days
Futures open interest declines >15% from stress peak

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Correlation re-establishes >0.5 with continued price decline

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Correlation remains elevated, higher low pattern fails, stablecoin reserves decline
